content:
Create a Change Status Quick Action for Cases

To set up cases in Lightning Experience, you must recreate the Change Status publisher as a quick action.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Essentials, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

User permissions needed:

Manage Cases
Customize Application

From Setup, click Object Manager. Select Cases and open Buttons, Links, and Actions setup page.
Click New Action. For Action Type, select Update a Record. For Standard Label Type, select Change Status. Click Save.
To choose fields users see, customize the action’s layout. Click Save.

After defining the quick action, add it to the case page layout so it’s available for agents to use.
title: Configure Change Status Quick Action in Service Cloud
